content: भागः [भज् भावे घञ्] {@--1@} A part, portion, share, division; as in भागहर, भागशः &c. {@--2@} Allotment, distribution, partition. {@--3@} Lot, fate; निर्माणभागः परिणतः <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--4@} A part of any whole, a fraction. {@--5@} The numerator of a fraction. {@--6@} A quarter, one-fourth part. {@--7@} A degree or the 360th part of the circumference of a circle. {@--8@} The 30th part of a zodiacal sign. {@--9@} The quotient. {@--10@} Room, space, spot, region, place; <ls>R. 18. 47.</ls>
